sent.orig: This manual is a basic orientation to the Scheme programming environment, designed for students taking 6.001.
sent.trans: 该手册是一个对于Scheme程式写作环境的基本指导手册，专门面向修读6.001课程的学生。

sent.orig: This is the reference manual for MIt'scheme, listing all the commands.
sent.trans: 这是麻省理工学院Scheme的参考手册，其中列举了所有的命令。

sent.orig: The scheme is based on the ACJT group signature scheme which is recognized to be efficient.
sent.trans: 该方案基于目前公认效率较高的ACJT群签名实现，具有较高的效率。

sent.orig: The scheme perfectly integrates digital signature scheme with public key cryptography system.
sent.trans: 该方案是数字签名与公钥密码体制的有机集成。

sent.orig: This scheme overcomes the inherent insecurity of traditional distributed computing scheme while retaining its advantages.
sent.trans: 此方案保留了传统的分布计算方案的优点，同时解决了传统分布计算方案的安全性问题。
